name: Ink-Black_Flap_Cap
description: The Ink-Black Flap Cap is a black aviator hat with a minimalistic design. It consists of a visor sewn to the front panel. The panel is ornamented with Barazushi handwriting. A pair of flaps on the sides are adorned with a white Barazushi logo with text underneath that face the same direction on both sides. Two buttons are on their top corners. The cap also possesses a tiny black toggle with an adjuster resembling a a squid, with a string loop beneath it.

name: Moto_Shades
description: The Moto Shades are a pair of motorcycle glasses with cherry tinted shades and black frame. Six screws can be seen around the hinges and the temples are curved to accomodate the wearer's ears.
